snippet: The man wounded two people on a charter bus en route to the Mohegan Sun casino in Uncasville, Conn., the police said.
abstract: Connecticut State Trooper Marc O'Mara shoots and kills man who was attacking fellow passengers with a knife on a bus bound for the Mohegan Sun Casino; two passengers on bus are injured during fracas.

byline.original: By ALISON LEIGH COWAN and MARC SANTORA
byline.contributor: Alison Leigh Cowan reported from Stamford, and Marc Santora from New York. Kristin Hussey contributed reporting from Norwalk, Conn., and Jeffrey E. Singer from New York.

lead_paragraph: The man wounded two people on a charter bus en route to the Mohegan Sun casino in Uncasville, Conn., the police said.

headline.main: Connecticut Trooper Kills Man Accused of Slashing 2 Aboard Bus Headed to Casino
headline.print_headline: Connecticut Trooper Kills Man Accused of Slashing 2 Aboard Bus Headed to Casino
